channel.title: My whitescape compiler is being gay!
channel.description:
well i am using a whitescape source for my server and when i run it it says
Compiling *.java 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. ~~~~Server on!~~~~ [9:24:29 PM]-:Starting WhiteScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
( i need to change orange part)
here is whats in my compiler/runserver
@echo off title Compiling Whitescape Pulse echo Compiling *.java javac -cp ../Classfiles -d ./Classfiles ./Javafiles/*.java ./Javafiles/Threads/*.java ./Javafiles/Skills/*.java title Running Whitescape Pulse :loop cd Classfiles @Echo ~~~~Server on!~~~~ java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server goto loop
pause

item.title: My whitescape compiler is being gay!
item.dc:creator: @pk-town pk-town
item.description:
@pk-town wrote:

well i am using a whitescape source for my server and when i run it it says

Compiling *.java
‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Server on!
[9:24:29 PM]-:Starting WhiteScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

( i need to change orange part)

here is whats in my compiler/runserver

@echo off
title Compiling Whitescape Pulse
echo Compiling .java
javac -cp …/Classfiles -d ./Classfiles ./Javafiles/.java ./Javafiles/Threads/.java ./Javafiles/Skills/.java
title Running Whitescape Pulse
:loop
cd Classfiles
@Echo Server on!
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
goto loop

pause

Read full topic
item.source: My whitescape compiler is being gay!
